For depositing just send the desired amount of GVT to this address. Or use the QR code below:

Or use your camera to read a QR code:

Not enough data to draw a chart
There are currently no tokens available. Please check this program later - someone can withdraw their funds from this program.
You have not yet invested\nin any program
You have not yet invested\nin any fund
At the end of the current trading period the tokens will be returned to the manager, and your funds will be returned to you.

You have been successfully invested %s GVT in the investment program. Your tokens will be working for you only since the next reporting period.\n\nIn case you decide to cancel the investment before the start of the next reporting period, you will have to pay a commission, and you will get your GVT at the actual GVT exchange rate.
No trades for the selected period.
No events for the selected period.
No transactions for the selected period.
You can send us your feedback in the following ways:
Total portfolio value is the value of all your tokens from all investment programs.
Equity is a current condition of a trading account. It is intended for maintaining manager\'s opened positions.

Total profit is the total all-time manager’s profit.

Avg. profit is the average profit for the period in relation to the starting balance.

Balance is the amount of funds on a trading account.

Investors is a number of investors who already invested in the manager.

Period duration is a period that is defined by a manager, at the end of which all trading positions are closed, with a subsequent profit distribution. Also, during this period investors can join or leave the investment program, additional investment amounts are made, and the commission is paid to the manager.
Manager\’s funds share is a percentage, showing the proportion of funds, belonging to the manager.
Trades is a history of financial operations, conducted by the manager.
Success fee is a payment to the manager for successful trading, set as a percentage of your profit.
Management fee is an annual obligatory commission, regardless of the outcome (profit or loss).
My tokens is the amount of manager\'s tokens, received from investing in this particular program.
My profit is the all–time profit that you earned from this program
Available to invest is an amount of GVT that investors can invest in this program.
Nothing was found by your request.
Here will be your favorites.\nYou should sign in first.
There are no programs registered in this round, or the round has not been launched yet.
The application requires an Internet connection, which is currently not available. Please check it, and then try again.
It seems there is a server error occurred. We already know about the problem and are working on it. Please try again later.
There is a new version available:
Would you like to update the app?
Don\'t remind me about this version again
To protect your funds, we strongly recommend you to enable the two factor authentication.\n\nYou can do it at any time from the Profile screen.
This is your Google 2FA Key. Please save it in a safe place. This key allows you to recover your two factor authentication in case of phone loss.
Confirm enabling the two factor authentication:
You have just successfully configured the two factor authentication. We will ask you for the 2FA Code in any potentially dangerous situation, such as logging in or withdrawing funds.

You can find your recovery codes below. You can use them in case you lost your 2FA key or lost your phone with the 2FA application installed. Each recovery code can be used only once. Save these codes on paper and put it in a safe place. If you are not sure that you can provide a secure place for the recovery codes, it would be safier to just ignore these codes.
WARNING: We do not store your recovery codes. If you lost the access to your 2FA, it is most likely that we couldn\'t help you to return the access to your account.
You have successfully disabled the two factor authentication.
However, we strongly recommend you keep it enabled. This can protect your funds from being stolen.
You are about to perform the following action:
Please confirm this action with a 2FA Code
You can use any third party implementation of Google Authenticator instead
You can also add the key using a QR code
Enter any name for the Key.\nFor example, \"Genesis Vision\"
Enter a 2FA Key.\nYou can find it on Step 2 \"Get key\"
Google Authenticator will start generating a 6 digit code
Use it when the Genesis Vision app requires a 2FA confirmation
Are you sure you want to log out?
Enter PIN code or use fingerprint
An error occurred while setting the PIN code. Please try again later
Too many attempts.\nPlease try again later
The lock screen has been disabled or a fingerprint has been added/removed.\nUse the PIN code instead
Touch the sensor to enable fingerprint authentication
Touch the sensor to disable fingerprint authentication
Cannot find any fingerprints registered on the device. You should add a fingerprint on the device first.
You should enable the PIN code first
Please grant the Storage permission in order to be able to choose the picture
The app is not able to set the picture until you grant the Storage permission
The app is not able to set the picture until you grant the Storage permission in Settings -> Apps
Please grant the Camera permission in order to be able to take a photo
The app is not able to take a photo until you grant the Camera permission
The app is not able to take a photo until you grant the Camera permission in Settings -> Apps

Your request will be processed at %s
Your request will be processed within a few minutes.
Please check the withdrawal details below. After you confirm it, please approve the withdrawal request by clicking on the link in the email we will send you.
The wallet address is not valid
I confirm that I am not a U.S. resident or citizen
Your request will be processed within a few minutes.
The withdrawal amount can be changed depending on the exchange rate or the success of the Manager.
Enter PIN code to enable it
Enter PIN code to disable it
After tapping the "Confirm" button, the invested %s will be immediately converted to %s.
%s Accrual of %s to the account manager will only occur at the end of the reporting period.
%s Accrual of %s to the account manager will occur at the moment the request is processed.
Your request will be processed at the end of the reporting period.
The entry fee is disabled for programs that have not reached level 3
It will be charged only for programs with level 3 or higher.
There are currently no open positions.
There are currently no deposits or withdrawals
Use this address to deposit %s to your %s wallet
The funds will be converted according to the current market price (Market order on Binance).

Genesis level reflects the experience and reliability of a manager.

All of the investment programs of a non-verified manager are limited to the first level and can’t level up unless the manager passes the KYC procedure. Once the verification process is completed, the investment programs of a manager are levelled up to the second level.

Starting from the second level, the level will depend on Av. to invest and is subject to constant change.

The available amount of money for investing in the manager is calculated as
Investment Scale is calculated according to a formula that takes into account:
The Success of the trading manager

The Success of the trading manager is calculated with the help of the Genesis Ratio, which is the ratio of the program profit to its risk. The formula is similar to the Sharpe ratio and is set in a range from 0 to 1. If Genesis Ratio <0.2, then the program is high risk and the Investment scale is limited to 1 meaning that the manager can attract no more than his own deposit.

This is a multiplier of the volume traded by the manager relative to the program balance for all periods. It is calculated similarly to the Genesis Ratio, being a weighted average over all periods.

To have a volume multiplier of 1 the managers weekly trading volume needs to be approximately the same as the amount of funds in his/her program. In the case of Forex programs, the volume is divided by the shoulder.

The coefficient is designed so that trading more in one period can compensate for the lack of volume during another period, but one-time high volumes won’t compensate for the lack of trading.

If the investor funds in the program exceed Av.to invest, then the Success Fee and Stop out Level are decreased until the investor funds in the program become less or equal to Av. to invest. This change takes effect in the new period.
If the manager is not verified, the available investment limit is always $1000, translated into account currency. Otherwise, the available limit is set in the range from $5k to $300k.
More information can be found in the
Genesis level shows the experience and reliability of the Manager
The volume of the opened positions is proportional to the balance of the signal provider and an investor.
Positions are opened according to the percentage of the volume of positions opened by the signal provider.
Each new position is opened at a fixed amount.
An investor at any time can perform a manual closing of all of the opened positions.
New trades do not open, open positions are closed as the manager closes them.
Instant closing of all open positions.
Unfortunately, this transaction type is not yet supported by this version of the application. It will be added in a future release.

You have no open trades at the moment.
No trades history for the selected period.
Are you sure you want to close %s trade in volume %s?
No program periods for the selected period.
No reallocates for the selected period.
Cannot find an appropriate application on the device to open this link
At least 300 x 300px PNG or JPG file.\nThe maximum file size is 2MB.
Please note that in order to create a fund you must deposit the equivalent of %s GVT at the end of the creation process.
You must deposit at least the equivalent of %s GVT to create a fund.
The total share of all assets should be equal to 100%.\nAt least 2 assets must be in the fund.
There is a mandatory %s%% %s allocation per Fund.
No assets found with your request
Tip: Long tap on an asset above to change its share
An entry fee is a fee charged to investors upon their investment to a GV fund. The maximum entry fee is %s%%
An exit fee is a fee charged to investors when they redeem shares from a GV fund. The maximum exit fee is %s%%
You have no trading accounts yet. Let\'s fix this.
You have no public assets yet. You can make one of your private accounts a program or a GV Follow.\n Or you can create your own GV Fund.
You must deposit at least the equivalent of %s to create a trading account.
Make your account a signal provider so that other users can copy your trades and bring you an extra income.
Make your account an investment program so that you can attract investors to manage their funds. Earn on commissions.
Stop out is the maximum drawdown level for the reporting period at which the program is stopped, and all investments return to investors.

Managers have the opportunity to choose when requests for investment / withdrawal of funds in the Program will be processed. This can be in real time or every day at a scheduled time (for example, you can set an investment/withdrawal at 5 pm).

At any time you can enter or cancel certain limitations on av. to invest, or even prohibit new investments if your Investment limit is 0. If the investment limit you\'ve entered is larger than the av. to invest value calculated for your current level, then you will only be able to attract the av. to invest value.
An entry fee is a fee charged to investors upon their investment to a program. The maximum entry fee is %s%%
A fee charged for the actual asset management period. Management fee is defined in annual percentage and is charged at the end of each reporting period. The maximum management fee is %s%%
A fee charged for the actual asset management period. Management fee is defined in annual percentage. The maximum management fee is %s%%
A fee charged upon the total profit made within the reporting period. The maximum success fee is %s%%
A fee charged upon the total profit. The maximum success fee is %s%%
A new stop out level cannot be greater than the original value
A stop out level cannot be less than %s
The minimal program deposit is %s. You must deposit additional %s (or the equivalent) to your trading account to satisfy this condition.
A fee charged upon the total trade volume made by your subscribers. It should be set in a range of %s-%s%%
A fee charged upon the total profit made by your subscribers. It should be set in a range of %s-%s%%

Migration started %s.\nYour broker will be changed from %s to %s within 24 hours after the end of the reporting period. You will receive a message confirming the successful change of the broker and you will receive a new login and password from the trading account. The invested funds in the program will be transferred to the new broker. All trading history and statistics will be saved on the program page.

A broker change in the program will occur automatically within 24 hours after the end of the reporting period. You will receive a message confirming the successful change of the broker and you will receive a new login and password from the trading account. The invested funds in the program will be transferred to the new broker. All trading history and statistics will be saved on the program page.
The current period of the program will end in one hour.

The investment program will be closed after this reporting period. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be distributed between investors and manager according to their shares within the aforementioned program.

The investment program will be closed after pressing the button. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be distributed between investors and manager according to their shares within the aforementioned program.
Managers have the ability to delay the public display of their trades and open positions to protect their strategy.
Do you really want to restart current period?

Investment program will be closed after this reporting period. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be deposited to investors and manager according to their shares.\n\nWARNING: This action cannot be undone! Are you sure?

Investment program will be closed after pressing the button. Current investment requests will be cancelled, and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be deposited to investors and manager according to their shares.\n\nWARNING: This action cannot be undone! Are you sure?
The fund will be closed after pressing the button.
The fund will be closed after pressing the button. Are you sure?
You are able to reallocate 3%% of the Fund per day (cumulative). Example: you will be able to change 30%% of the Fund’s allocation after 10 days.
First, you need to select the trading account to which you want to copy trades.
Unfortunately, you do not have suitable trading accounts with which you can subscribe to this Follow. You should create it first.
This account used to copy trades of %d %s. See details for more info.
This account does not follow any trades at the moment. You can find a new Follow to subscribe or you can resubscribe to one of the Follow from the History below.
All the Follow you will unsubscribe from can be found here.
Please fill out public information about yourself first. This will help other users to identify you.
You have no investment in any program.
You have no investment in any fund.
Other Genesis Vision users will be able to follow you and see your current and past investments as well as your portfolio performance. You will also be displayed in the Investors Rating.
Warning: all signal program subscriptions will be cancelled when switching from GM to Huobi (we do not currently offer copy trading on Huobi).
You have no referral friends yet.
Invite your friends to Genesis Vision

Please provide us your API key and API secret, so that we can attach your external account to Genesis Vision. Usually, the API key and the API secret can be found in your profile or on a settings page of your exchange.
Are you sure you want to stop following trades of this Follow?
Using GVT to pay for fees
Genesis Vision Token holders who select Genesis Markets as their broker will receive discounted transaction fees.
To be eligible for a trading discount:
There must be more than 1 GVT stored in the wallet
The \"Using GVT to pay for fees\" function must be enabled. The fee will be charged at a discount depending on the amount of GVT stored in the wallet.
The discounted fee will be charged from the GVT wallet, not from the trading account.
If you switch this function off, the fee will become \"Regular\" and charge 100%.
If you have enabled the \"Using GVT to pay for fees\" function but have an insufficient amount of GVT stored in the wallet, this function will no longer work and the fee will become Regular.

For managers the commission for trading will be debited from the manager’s GVT wallet. At the end of the reporting period, the manager will receive a refund of the commission at the expense of increasing the share of own funds in management.

The ratio of the profit of the program against its risk. It is set in the range from 0 to 1. If Genesis Ratio < 0.2, then the program is high risk and the Investment Scale is limited to 1, meaning that the manager can attract no more than his own deposit.
The current value of the indicator, which depends on the Age, Volume Scale and Genesis Ratio. The indicator is set in a range from 1 to 20.\n\nAvailable to invest = Investment scale * Manager balance

This is a multiplier of the volume traded by the manager relative to the program balance for all periods. It is calculated similarly to the Genesis Ratio, being a weighted average over all given periods.

A program performance indicator, which is calculated as the mathematical ratio of the average return to the average deviation of this return. The higher the Sharpe Ratio value, the lower the portfolio risks.

It is a variation of the Sharpe ratio that only factors in the downside risk. The greater the value of Sortino Ratio, the higher the efficiency of the portfolio and the lower the investment risks of investing in a fund.
A comparison of the average annual compounded rate of return and the maximum drawdown risk of asset managers and hedge funds. The higher the score, the better the portfolio is formed.
The biggest drawdown of a fund during the selected date range.
How much in % has the profit changed in the current time period compared to the previous one in the same period.
The сommission that is paid to the manager by an investor for the actual asset management period. Management fee is defined in annual percentage and is charged at the end of each reporting period.
In the event a program hits the Stop-Out limit:

“Ignore SO” is turned off → your investment (minus losses) is returned to your wallet.\n\n“Ignore SO” is turned on → your investment (minus losses) is reinvested in the program keeping all configured conditions saved.

If the reinvestment trigger is on, then at the end of the period all profits after deducting the commission will be reinvested back into the program.\n\nIf the button is not pressed, then at the end of the period all the profits will be transferred to your GVT wallet.
Share your ideas.\n- Use @ to mention a user or a GV asset\n- Use # to mention a ticker or add a hashtag
Do you want to finish? The changes will not be saved.

KYC is an authentication mechanism required in the financial industry to help ensure companies are compliant with anti money laundering regulations.

Insufficient balance. Minimum deposit to create a program is %s

Diversify your capital across hundreds of cryptocurrencies.
1. Create a fund by percentage allocating capital to crypto assets that meet your strategy.
2. Attract investors to your fund and earn commissions
3. Track and manage your fund by re-allocating assets.

Create your own portfolio with crypto assets that match your strategy. You can change its entire structure at any time. Self-managed Funds are private so you cannot attract investor capital. All re-allocation history, profits and losses are kept private. You can always change your fund to Public to attract investment.

Programs are similar to PAMM accounts.
1. Create a program and raise capital for ongoing trading by attracting investors.
2. Trade using the assets under management (AUM) and earn profit. Any profits generated will be divided among all participants who have joined your program.
3. Set your own commissions and receive a percentage of the investors' profit.
Create a trading account and get access to a variety of instruments (depending on your desired broker.) Trade Forex, Crypto, CFD, Stocks, Metals, Indices and Commodities.

Add your Binance account to the platform to copy trades opened and managed by another trader, while having complete control over your capital. You can also make your account a signal provider at any time.
To secure your account, please complete the following verification.\n\nEnter the 6 digit code received by %s

Please ensure that you are using Binance Smart Chain network (BSC) when depositing BNB to this address. You will loose your assets if you do not chose the correct network.
